entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 06:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -24.8°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
